name: DocumentType
description: The DocumentType interface represents a Node containing a doctype.

members.name: DocumentType.entities
members.description: A NamedNodeMap of entities declared in the DTD. Every node in this map implements the Entity interface.

members.name: DocumentType.internalSubset
members.description: A DOMString of the internal subset, or null if there is none. Eg "<!ELEMENT foo (bar)>".

members.name: DocumentType.notations
members.description: A NamedNodeMap with notations declared in the DTD. Every node in this map implements the Notation interface.

members.name: DocumentType.publicId
members.description: A DOMString, eg "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01//EN", empty string for HTML5.

members.name: DocumentType.systemId
members.description: A DOMString, eg "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/strict.dtd", empty string for HTML5.

members.name: ChildNode.remove()
members.description: Removes the object from its parent children list.
